label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_004
content:
## 2026-01-06 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /zone-transfers: REQUESTS req | p50: 590ms p95: 1320ms p99: N/A | err: 2.5% (1 errors) | success: 97.5%
- /axfr-requests: REQUESTS req | p50: 590ms p95: 1320ms p99: N/A | err: 2.5% (1 errors) | success: 97.5%
- /ixfr-requests: REQUESTS req | p50: 590ms p95: 1320ms p99: N/A | err: 0.9% (2 errors) | success: 99.1%
- /dns-queries: QPS avg: 19800 | peak: 45200 | nx_domain: 2.0% | servfail: 0.06% | udp: 96.6% | tcp_fallback: 1.7%
- /dnssec-signing: zones_signed: 52 | signature_refreshes: 118 | signing_queue_depth: 2 | ds_mismatch: 0 | bogus_validations: 2
- /health-checks: authoritative_reachability: 99.98% | soa_serial_mismatch: 2 | lame_delegation: 0
- /change-requests: total: 6 | applied: 6 | failed: 0 | mean_apply_time: 21 min
- /cache-behavior: resolver_cache_hit: 87.9% | negative_cache_hit: 40.6% | prefetch_enabled: 68.0%
- /latency: auth_response_avg: 18.9ms | auth_response_p95: 46.2ms | edns0_present: 72.9%
- /errors: format_errors: 9 | refused: 33 | rate_limited: 14 | truncation_tc: 0.6%
- /propagation: cloud_edge_sites: 34 | propagation_avg: 70s | propagation_p95: 170s | stale_answer_pct: 0.4%

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 35% | Mem 63% | Disk 72% | Conns: 1295 | Net: 86/117 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 28% | Mem 52% | Disk 55% | Conns: 1090 | Net: 70/85 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 55% | Mem 69% | Disk 47% | Conns: N/A | Net: 98/135 Mbps | Queue depth: 5
- signer-01: CPU 41% | Mem 72% | Disk 59% | Conns: N/A | Net: 17/21 Mbps | HSM slot utilization: 55%

### Connection Pools
- pool-name: active 0 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 0 | avg_wait: 0ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 87.9% | Bandwidth: N/A | Origin requests: N/A

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNSSEC bogus validation events on zone: 2
- [INFO] SOA serial mismatch count: 2
- [WARNING] N/A
- [CRITICAL] N/A

### Deployments & Changes
- Re-ran lint and normalization across newly imported zones; reduced errors from 11 to 4 by fixing TXT escaping and missing origin suffixes.
- Performed controlled IXFR catch-up to cloud-managed secondary; SOA serial mismatches dropped from 6 to 2.
- Implemented rate limiting adjustment for ANY queries; refused count steady and truncation decreased.
- Validated DNSSEC chain for previously paused zone after registrar DS sync; resumed signing and monitored for bogus validations.

### Events
- Re-ran lint and normalization across newly imported zones; reduced errors from 11 to 4 by fixing TXT escaping and missing origin suffixes.
- Performed controlled IXFR catch-up to cloud-managed secondary; SOA serial mismatches dropped from 6 to 2.
- Implemented rate limiting adjustment for ANY queries; refused count steady and truncation decreased.
- Validated DNSSEC chain for previously paused zone after registrar DS sync; resumed signing and monitored for bogus validations.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Shift: M. Chen. 2 pages. 6 tickets. Status: Healthy; continued cleanup and verified DNSSEC correctness.
